Uses of Package
nl.inl.blacklab.forwardindex

  • Packages that use nl.inl.blacklab.forwardindex 
    Package Description
    nl.inl.blacklab.forwardindex
    Manages the forward index, used for fast sorting and grouping.
    nl.inl.blacklab.mocks  
    nl.inl.blacklab.resultproperty  
    nl.inl.blacklab.search
    Contains the main BlackLab classes.
    nl.inl.blacklab.search.results
    Classes for dealing with results, either per-hit or per-document or grouped
    nl.inl.blacklab.testutil
    Package for test applications, for example doing performance testing on the different parts of BlackLab, and tools that can help with debugging problems.
  • Classes in nl.inl.blacklab.forwardindex used by nl.inl.blacklab.forwardindex 
    Class and Description
    AnnotationForwardIndex
    A component that can quickly tell you what word occurs at a specific position of a specific document.
    AnnotationForwardIndex.CollatorVersion
    Different versions of insensitive collator
    AnnotationForwardIndex.ForwardIndexDocTask
    A task to perform on a document in the forward index.
    Collators
    Collators to use for term equality testing for different sensitivity settings.
    FIDoc
    A document in the (multi-)forward index.
    FiidLookup
    Class for looking up forward index id, using DocValues or stored fields.
    ForwardIndex
    A component that can quickly tell you what word occurs at a specific position of a specific document.
    Terms
    Keeps a list of unique terms and their sort positions.
